text: Jared Kushner ( left ), adviser to President Donald Trump, and Kim Kardashian West ( right ) are reportedly in talks to pardon a 62 - year - old grandmother serving a life sentence for a first - time, nonviolent drug offense. One week after Kourtney Kardashian took Capitol Hill, E! News has learned Kim Kardashian West is in talks with the White House. The ` ` Keeping Up With the Kardashians'' star's rep confirmed Wednesday that Kardashian West and Jared Kushner, who is President Donald Trump's senior adviser and son - in - law, are speaking. This news follows Mic's report that Kardashian West and Ivanka Trump's husband are in talks about a ` ` possible presidential pardon
